Locations.Name: City
Locations.Description: A bustling metropolis filled with towering buildings, vibrant streets, and countless stories waiting to unfold.

Locations.Name: Desert
Locations.Description: A vast expanse of golden sand, unforgiving sun, and ancient secrets hidden beneath the dunes.

Locations.Name: Forest
Locations.Description: A verdant haven of towering trees, whispering winds, and hidden paths leading to unknown wonders.

Locations.Name: Island
Locations.Description: A secluded paradise with pristine beaches, crystal-clear waters, and a mystery waiting to be discovered.
